column4: hey guys, i need help with my ntfs partition, i have ntfs-g3 installed and it works great, but if i delete files in my ntfs drive, i cannot get any free space. Please help
i need space in my drive
sorry let me try that again,  can you rephrase your problem
might be a better idea to boot windows and clean up your ntfs partiton fromthere
js the trashcan on your desktop,  emtpy that an the file space should get freed
